name: Ridicubous
description:
Ridicubous

Start, obstacles, goal.
Start, obstacles, item, obstacles, goal.
Start, obstacles, item, obstacles, item, obstacles, checkpoint, obstacles, item, obstacles, item, obstacles, goal.
.
.
.
Start, lots of obstacles, lots of items, no checkpoints, lots of attempts, goal.

Take "Ridi" to the goal. Very simple, very fun.

Specifications:

- Game on English and Spanish.
- Classic 2D skill game brought to 3D, and some other surprises.
- Cube with "natural" movement.
- Graphics and music with sci-fan atmosphere.
- Music and effects of TSODE.
- 30 levels with progressive difficulty.
- 2 game modes:
Classic, from the beginning, with time and accumulated trials and best score.
Levels, play all levels in classic mode overcome and unlock the following, if you can.
